title: Bug 4971: Unexpected 'copy package'
description:
Bug 4971: Unexpected 'copy package' occurs in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui.
Selecting xxx as the destination package instead.
OB: When selecting the 'copy package' option from the context menu, the package destination is displayed as xxx instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'
EB: The 'copy package' feature should display 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination package instead of xxx.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new project.
2. Open the Package viewer.
3. Select a package in Project A.
4. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
5. Observe that the destination package is displayed as xxx instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
